cards.alt: Screenshot of the mock client project Beth Electric.
cards.title: Mock Client Challenge
cards.subtitle: A website created for a small business

sections.content: Over the course of a six-day sprint, I built a website for a mock client from the ground up.

cards.title: Crash Course Redo
cards.subtitle: Using PHP to reconfigure the PBS Crash Course Computer Science site

sections.content: I mimicked the PBS Crash Course website to practice building a website backed by JSON, and in an attempt to improve the user experience of the site. Videos can be sorted in ascending or descending order, and the site can be toggled between light and dark modes.

cards.title: Choose Your Own Adventure
cards.subtitle: A 'choose your own adventure' birthday card

sections.content: As a gift for my friend's 40th birthday, I made a virtual 'choose your own adventure' card. This was basic practice with file paths, but it is a project idea that merits further development.
